code: import React from'react';import{useCart}from'../CartContext';import'./Product.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useCart();const imageUrl=product.image_url||"http://localhost:8000".concat(product.image);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:product.name,className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-description",children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"product-price",children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"Add to Cart"})]})]});};export default Product;
